original: Tyrion Cuthbert is a defense attorney who primarily defends mages among the commonfolk. After witnessing Wyverngarde’s judicial corruption first-hand, he began studying law under the infamous Ruby Tymora. Under her tutelage, he became a full-fledged defense attorney at the young age of twenty.
translation: 提利昂·卡斯伯特是个辩护律师，主要为平民法师们辩护。在亲身体会过维文加德的司法腐败后，他跟着臭名昭著的鲁比·泰摩拉学习法律。在她的指点下，提利昂在20岁就成为了成熟的辩护律师。
